name: ivendPay
description: ⚡️ Ivendpay is a payment system that allows accepting of crypto through POS terminal, vending machine, API and mobile app available at App Store or Google Store. (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ivendpay.com) One of the main missions of ivendPay is providing crypto-fiat solutions and reducing of processing costs and fees.
